channel.title: Homes on Omid Poursaeed
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Omid Poursaeed

item.description: About I am a Research Scientist at Meta AI. Before joining Meta, I obtained my PhD from Cornell University with Serge Belongie. My research interests include Computer Vision, Multi-modal Learning and Generative Models.

item.title: Experience
item.description: Research Intern: Adobe Research with Vladimir Kim and Matthew Fisher, Summer 2019 Research Intern: Facebook AI with SerNam Lim, Fall & Winter 2019 Research Intern: Adobe Research with Vladimir Kim and Eli Shechtman, Summer 2018 Research Intern: eBay Research with Shuai Zheng, Hadi Kiapour and Robinson Piramuthu, Summer 2017

item.title: Presentations
item.description: Hybrid Generative Models for 2D and 3D Computer Vision: Invited talk at Facebook AI and Apple Learning to Generate and Animate for Augmented Reality: Invited talk at Facebook Reality Labs and Microsoft Mixed Reality & AI Labs DeepFakes and Adversarial Examples: Fooling Humans and Machines: Digital Life Seminar Series

item.title: Service
item.description: Reviewer for CVPR, NeurIPS, ICCV, ECCV, ICLR, AAAI, IEEE TPAMI, IEEE Transactions on Multimedia, IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics & Security, ACM Transactions on Privacy and Security, IEEE Transactions on Industrial Electronics, CVPR Workshop on Adversarial Machine Learning

item.title: Patents
item.description: Learning Hybrid Shape Representations, with Vladimir Kim, Matthew Fisher and Noam Aigerman Object animation using Generative Neural Networks, with Vladimir Kim, Jun Saito and Eli Shechtman Generating a digital image using a generative adversarial network, with Shuai Zheng, Hadi Kiapour and Robinson Piramuthu
